title: [Self-directed] Spatiotemporal Continuity Design Strategies for Advanced Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Scientific analytical skills and expertise-based knowledge
context.additional_context: Non-real-time online education for medical/legal/technical professionals, utilizing digital devices for self-directed learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply design principles for integrating spatiotemporal distributed information with over 80% accuracy.
Implement spatiotemporal continuity strategies that reduce cognitive load in complex scientific materials by over 30%.
Demonstrate practical skills in diagnosing and improving attention-distracting factors in online learning environments according to assessment criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
